form.name: keeping_child_warm_on_the_way_to_the_hospital1
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Keeping Child Warm On The Way To The Hospital>Keeping Child Warm On The Way To The Hospital1

field.name: Keeping Child Warm on the Way to the Hospital | Counseling
Call for help for transportation, care, money
Keep the child warm by holding him/her close to your body and covering the child with cloth.
Breastfeed your child every 2 hours while waiting and on the way to the clinic. Or express breast milk and feed your child with a clean cup
